name: **Inishtroghenmore – _Inis Srathair_**
description: Inishtroghenmore – Inis Srathair L769-312 Sheet 44 Grass and gorse. A horse graxed this island in May 2008. Nice views towards Carna and the mountains to the N. A fine bundle of boulders graces the centre point, nowadays a shelter for four footed creatures. Large mudflats surround, and the island is best enjoyed of a fine evening at HW.
